speaker: ANTIGONUS
text_entry: SCENE II. A prison.

speaker: ANTIGONUS
text_entry: Enter PAULINA, a Gentleman, and Attendants

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: The keeper of the prison, call to him;

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: let him have knowledge who I am.

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Exit Gentleman

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Good lady,

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: No court in Europe is too good for thee;

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: What dost thou then in prison?

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Re-enter Gentleman, with the Gaoler

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Now, good sir,

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: You know me, do you not?

speaker: Gaoler
text_entry: For a worthy lady

speaker: Gaoler
text_entry: And one whom much I honour.

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Pray you then,

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Conduct me to the queen.

speaker: Gaoler
text_entry: I may not, madam:

speaker: Gaoler
text_entry: To the contrary I have express commandment.

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Here's ado,

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: To lock up honesty and honour from

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: The access of gentle visitors!

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Is't lawful, pray you,

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: To see her women? any of them? Emilia?

speaker: Gaoler
text_entry: So please you, madam,

speaker: Gaoler
text_entry: To put apart these your attendants, I

speaker: Gaoler
text_entry: Shall bring Emilia forth.

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: I pray now, call her.

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Withdraw yourselves.

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Exeunt Gentleman and Attendants

speaker: Gaoler
text_entry: And, madam,

speaker: Gaoler
text_entry: I must be present at your conference.

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Well, be't so, prithee.

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Exit Gaoler

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Here's such ado to make no stain a stain

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: As passes colouring.

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Re-enter Gaoler, with EMILIA

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Dear gentlewoman,

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: How fares our gracious lady?

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: As well as one so great and so forlorn

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: May hold together: on her frights and griefs,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Which never tender lady hath born greater,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: She is something before her time deliver'd.

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: A boy?

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: A daughter, and a goodly babe,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Lusty and like to live: the queen receives

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Much comfort in't; says 'My poor prisoner,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: I am innocent as you.'

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: I dare be sworn

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: These dangerous unsafe lunes i' the king,

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: beshrew them!

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: He must be told on't, and he shall: the office

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Becomes a woman best; I'll take't upon me:

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: If I prove honey-mouth'd let my tongue blister

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: And never to my red-look'd anger be

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: The trumpet any more. Pray you, Emilia,

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Commend my best obedience to the queen:

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: If she dares trust me with her little babe,

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: I'll show't the king and undertake to be

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Her advocate to the loud'st. We do not know

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: How he may soften at the sight o' the child:

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: The silence often of pure innocence

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Persuades when speaking fails.

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Most worthy madam,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Your honour and your goodness is so evident

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: That your free undertaking cannot miss

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: A thriving issue: there is no lady living

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: So meet for this great errand. Please your ladyship

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: To visit the next room, I'll presently

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Acquaint the queen of your most noble offer;

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Who  but to-day hammer'd of this design,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: But durst not tempt a minister of honour,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Lest she should be denied.

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Tell her, Emilia.

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: I'll use that tongue I have: if wit flow from't

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: As boldness from my bosom, let 't not be doubted

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: I shall do good.

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Now be you blest for it!

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: I'll to the queen: please you,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: come something nearer.

speaker: Gaoler
text_entry: Madam, if't please the queen to send the babe,

speaker: Gaoler
text_entry: I know not what I shall incur to pass it,

speaker: Gaoler
text_entry: Having no warrant.

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: You need not fear it, sir:

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: This child was prisoner to the womb and is

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: By law and process of great nature thence

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Freed and enfranchised, not a party to

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: The anger of the king nor guilty of,

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: If any be, the trespass of the queen.

speaker: Gaoler
text_entry: I do believe it.

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Do not you fear: upon mine honour,

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: I will stand betwixt you and danger.

speaker: PAULINA
text_entry: Exeunt
